name: Post-Disclosure, Devil's Night
description:
Go to a party. Meet some old friends. Don't get in your head about it.

Click ">" to move forward. If there isn't a ">", click the passage until a ">" appears. Some passages are timed: If there's a ">" and it doesn't show up with clicking, just give it a minute. 

A work of interactive fiction by Roxy S., made for the Cozy Autumn Game Jam 2022.

Happy Fall!
